column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| nationality |         |         |         |         |         |
| transport  |         |         |         |         |         |
| beverage |         |         |         |         |         |
| music-genre  |         |         |         |         |         |
| hobby  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
The people use 5 different means of transport: motorbike, bus, ship, subway, quad-bike
There are 5 different nationalities: english, spanish, ukranian, norwegian, japanese
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: hip-hop, quad-bikes, trance, d&b, rock
There are 5 different favourite beverages: coffee, tea, milk, orange-juice, water
The people have 5 different hobbies: singing, photography, board-games, fishing, writing

1. the english is the person driving the motorbike
2. the spanish is the person who's hobby is singing
3. the person drinking coffee is the person driving the bus
4. the ukranian is the person drinking tea
5. the person driving the bus is to the right of the person driving the ship
6. the fan of hip-hop is the person who's hobby is writing
7. the fan of quad-bikes is the person driving the subway
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the fan of trance is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is photography
11. the fan of quad-bikes is to the left or right of the person who's hobby is fishing
12. the fan of d&b is the person drinking orange-juice
13. the japanese is the fan of rock
14. the norwegian is to the left or right of the person driving the quad-bike. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
